books.title: The Psychology of Computer Programming
books.description: This classic work explores the psychological challenges faced by programmers and how understanding these aspects can lead to better collaboration and problem-solving.

author.biography: Gerald M. Weinberg was an American software engineer and author known for his work on the human aspects of software engineering.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.description: An exploration of human history from the Stone Age to the 21st century, examining how Homo sapiens came to dominate the Earth.

author.biography: Yuval Noah Harari is an Israeli historian and professor at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem.
